frontmatter.title: Hello there, I'm Robert. Nice to meet you!

node.html:
A soon-to-be graduate of the MSC in Computer Science at Aalto University, my journey actually began at the HES-SO Valais where I studied Business Information Technology.

I am always looking for new challenges and opportunities that will help me learn and grow as a person.

Currently, I am open to new opportunities from freelance work to full-time contract.

Thanks for viewing my portfolio!
Developed an interactive data visualization tool using D3.js and Vue.js. The data processing and algorithm were coded in JavaScript.

frontmatter.company: Institute of Information Systems HES-SO Valais

node.html: Designed a prototype to visualize 3D medical images on the Microsoft HoloLens and the HTC Vive using Unity and C#. Developed a Java API to handle the heavy computations.
Customer service, food / beverage service, scheduling, inventory.
Customer service, bus passes sales, excursion planning.
Our service incited clients to make sustainable choices. Our team developed a React dashboard and an Android application, both connected to a Firebase backend.
Promoted the use of XR technologies in the medical field to experts in the healthcare industry. Our rescue application made during the Arkathon was showcased.
Our team developed a simulation to train specialists to intervene in an extreme environment. Our rescue simulation was made for the HTC Vive using Unity and C#.
